gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nuggets 107, Pistons 103
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nuggets defeated the Pistons, 107-103. Reggie Jackson led the way with 21 points, three rebounds, and three assists for the Nuggets, with Christian Braun adding 15 points and six rebounds in the victory. Cade Cunningham tallied 27 points and nine assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Nuggets improve to 10-4 in the regular season, while the Pistons fall to 2-13.
